div.div: AUSD wants your input on the Local Control and Accountability Plan (click the link above for more information)
AUSD is committed to promoting a safe school environment for our whole community. Here is more information on the proactive steps AUSD is undertaking to achieve that goal.
Stay up-to-date on the latest developments in the budget priorities process.

h3.a: AHS Students organize Albany Responds COVID-19 Food Drive

div.div: Surplus items will be sold at public auction on eBay through user: baycitysurplus.com. Bay City Surplus may be reached via email: richard@baycitysurplus.com or by phone at (800) 870-6006.

h3.a: 2020 Census and Census in Schools Week: April 13-17
April 14th Board of Education Regular Meeting (click for agenda)

div.div:
The April 14th Board Meeting will be held remotely via Zoom and broadcast live for the public to watch on AlbanyKalb: www.youtube.com/albanykalb. Public comments may be submitted prior to the meeting to: publiccomment@ausdk12.org.
Please click on the agenda link above for more details.
Please check out the new FAQs and Resources page. This will be updated as information becomes available.

h3.a: April 1st: No joke! AUSD Schools Will Remain Closed for Rest of 2019-2020 School Year

div.div: Alameda County Superintendent of Schools, L. Karen Monroe, announced this afternoon that schools will remain closed for the rest of 2019-2020 school year. Please click the link above to read her statement. More details and information to come.
Location: Albany High School, 603 Key Rte Blvd, Albany, CA 94706, USA

Location: Albany City Hall, 1000 San Pablo Ave., Albany CA, 94706,

Albany Unified School District is committed to providing a website that is accessible to everyone that visits our site. If you have difficulty accessing any of the information on this site please let us know.
